overview:
President

B. 1971 Yokohama. Graduated from the Kunitachi College of Music (Tokyo) / Bachelor of Music [1995]. Fellow Artist at the Agency for Cultural Affairs, Japan [2002]. Fellow Artist at The City of Paris and The Ministry of Foreign Affairs, France [2003]. Fellow Artist of the POLA Art Foundation [2004]. Fellow Composer at the Berliner Kunstlerprogramm des DAAD [2005]. Fellow Artist at the UNESCO-Aschberg Bursaries for Artists: Fellowship [2006]. Acknowledged as a “Super Creator from of the Mitoh - Exploratory Software Project/IPA, Japan [2006]. Fellow Artist at the MapXXL-Pepinieres Europeennes pour Jeunes Artistes (EU) [2007].
